contentfulProjectEntry.title: Ground Reality - Police called to disperse mob

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Yesterday again we just ran into a mob.

When our purchase manager Rafiq bhai reached the truck it was Maghrib time and he had to wait for pick up.

Waiting those few minutes outside, a crowd gathered and followed the team up to the gates.

Team was able to enter the Madrassa (our point of distribution), but the crowd outside grew, becoming violent.

Police had to be called to disperse them.
